header.title: top.about.content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: ʘmʘchim are little mechs shaped like "o-mochi," the famous Japanese snack. They're your trusty partner equipped with various sensors that you can operate via remote control or program to run!

header.title: top.about.image_top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
Create, play, and share
Endless creative puzzles

header.title: top.about.image_bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
Multilingual platform!
Publish your games to the world

header.title: top.park.content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Build all sorts of ʘmʘchim mechs that possess different functions by combining motors, hinges, and other construction parts. Plan and put together custom-made forms to go with your parks!

header.title: top.park.image_top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Need to transport lots of cargo in one go? Just make your ʘmʘchim into a truck!

header.title: top.park.image_bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Utilize programming to do lots more with your custom-made forms.

header.title: top.partner.content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Use the editor feature to create your own park in which you can play and experiment with the physics engine, then share it with others.

header.title: top.partner.image_top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: It's easy to place various objects and edit the terrain and programming.

header.title: top.partner.image_bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Share your completed park, and let everyone play in your cool park!

header.title: top.make.balloon
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Everything you need for creation is here. Enjoy creating!

header.title: top.make.left
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Easy 3D placement with your mouse. Use power and joint parts, then get them moving with the physics engine.

header.title: top.make.center
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Programming Lots to create with no coding required! A wide variety of sample codes is also available.

header.title: top.make.right
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Plenty of BGM, SFX, and VFX assets included! Make your parks unique by using the specialized app.

header.title: top.play.balloon_top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: More and more parks others have made get added every month!

header.title: top.play.balloon_bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Try out all sorts of parks! You'll earn achievements, too!

header.title: top.play.left
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Play with others from all over the world in online multiplayer mode!!(The online multiplayer mode is under development now.)

header.title: top.play.right
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Find and follow your favorite creators. Users who like your parks can also follow you.

header.title: top.code.top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: ʘmʘchim mech that you can use in conjunction with the app.

header.title: top.code.left
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Once connected to the app, you can program the ʘmʘchim mech using the same code.

header.title: top.code.center
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: A sheet metal frame made with strength and design in mind! LEGO blocks can also be used!

header.title: top.code.right
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: It has powerful sensors for distance measuring inclines, direction, movement, etc.

header.title: top.code.detail
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: The main draw of ʘmʘchim mech is that, in addition to being in the digital world, you can actually touch and play with it using your hands. You can even create your very own park on top of a desk in your room!

header.title: top.learn.message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: wants you to know something...

header.title: top.learn.detail
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Games are fun to play, and even more fun to make! At least, that's how a lot of game developers feel. The very act of creating can be the best way to have fun. And this game is all about creating! Having fun while making

header.title: top.connect.follow
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
Check here for the latest news and announcements!
Go ahead and follow our official X account!

header.title: top.connect.note
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: ʘmʘchim behind-the-scene stories, workshop reports, and more are posted here from time to time!

header.title: top.connect.discord
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: The official community for ʘmʘchim users. Here, you'll be able to ask questions and find like-minded players.

header.title: top.information.os_value
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
Windows: Windows 10 and later
Mac: macOS Catalina 10.15 and later

header.title: top.information.hardware_value
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: PCs less than 5 years old with dedicated graphics cards, or laptops less than 3 years old with built-in graphics cards.

header.title: top.modal.omochim.top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Having an ʘmʘchim frame will open up more ways to play. You can operate an ʘmʘchim frame with the same in-game codes, so your home can essentially become a park!

header.title: top.modal.omochim.bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: The method of control you develop in the game can also be used for controlling drones. That means you'll end up improving other skills as your ʘmʘchim knowledge and skills increase.

header.title: parent-teacher.kv.content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: What ʘmʘchim can promise in educational settings

header.title: parent-teacher.learning.top_title
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Players will naturally develop their programming and logical thinking skills while playing with the ʘmʘchim.

header.title: parent-teacher.learning.top_content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: The best way to encourage learning is to make it enjoyable. Playing fosters further interest in a topic, and provides a natural and fun way to learn and continue learning.

header.title: parent-teacher.learning.bottom_content
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: The Prototype Hacking Method is a unique learning method born from a professional development worksite. Tapping into children's innate desires to experiment, kids will learn logical structures in a fun way through repeated trial and error, which fosters creativity. ʘmʘchim is a game that's designed with this method in mind.

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.sub_title
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Creating your own way to play, through play. Creativity can flourish when there aren't any rules.

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.top
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
So, what exactly is a game? Most people will answer
that a game is any activity that "has rules."

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.middle
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
With this game, we wanted to eliminate rules as much as we could.
In doing so, we hope to have the players themselves think up
their own rules as part of what makes the game fun.

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.bottom
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
With ʘmʘchim, players are free to choose how they play.
Through the fun experience of "creating your own way to play,"
we hope that all players can experience
an enriching environment that fosters creativity.

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.representative_message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: We have worked for a long time to bring you an awesome experience of "creating your own way to play." So, We hope everyone has fun and a creative time!

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.director_message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: ʘmʘchim was created with the goal of making the act of creation as enjoyable as possible. Play makes for the best way to learn! I hope you enjoy the game!

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.programmer_message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd:
Even with no experience in programming, you can turn ideas into cool parks!
And if you end up learning some programming along the way, all the better!

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.komatu_message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: I hope we are able to convey the joys of creating through ʘmʘchim. Definitely try everything out!

header.title: parent-teacher.thought.matuoka_message
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: We've included lots of music and sound effects in the game, so I hope that you enjoy using them in addition to creating different forms and motions.

header.title: housing.housing.title
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: A frame you can operate in real life.

header.title: housing.housing.main_detail
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: ESP32 (16MB flash / 8MB PSRAM), AAA powered (eneloop recommended), mini planetary gear motor x2 (with rotary encoder), headlamp, tail light, 6-axis sensor (LSM6DSM), buzzer, servo extension cable x2, IC extension cable x2, 55 x 69 x 62mm (height, width, depth), 68g

header.title: housing.housing.attachment_detail
ʘmʘchim Official Site | Asobism Co., Ltd: Camera (OV2640), gesture sensor (APDS-9960), distance sensor (VL53L0CX), infrared side sensor, equipped with red and blue LEDs on front left and right
